<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A set of parameters used to control various transforms performed by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// LoopUnroll pass. Each of the boolean parameters can be set to:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      true - enabling the transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      false - disabling the transformation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///      None - relying on a global default.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// There is also OptLevel parameter, which is used for additional loop unroll</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tuning.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Intended use is to create a default object, modify parameters with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// additional setters and then pass it to LoopUnrollPass.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Loop unroll pass that will support both full and partial unrolling.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is a function pass to have access to function and module analyses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It will also put loops into canonical form (simplified and LCSSA).</span></CodeLine>
